attributes.action: increase the penalties for dangerous driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The penalties for killing anyone through dangourous driving at too low.  We call for a review and a hopefully increase.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "increase the penalties for dangerous driving."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11010.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Dangerous/
